short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Xperience Browser Extension for managing your XPLL

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Access ParallelChain from your browser.

Xperience Browser Extension allows users to access ParallelChain straight from their browsers. Dapp developers can also use this browser extension to have their dapps read from ParallelChain and interact with users' ParallelChain accounts.

With Xperience Browser Extension, users can manage their ParallelChain wallet (also known as Xperience), stake XPLL, send and receive tokens, and operate PRFC tokens in addition to XPLL.

Dapps can perform transactions and write to ParallelChain using Xperience Browser Extension which also enables users to interact with the tokens and smart contracts deployed by the dapp developers.
